text.name: Sewing
text.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 10% of the HP damage dealt (max 10)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 40 [BloodDinner] and gain 1 [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] for every 8 [BloodDinner] this unit consumed
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain +2 [Laceration] Count

text.name: Sewing
text.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 10% of the HP damage dealt (max 10)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 40 [BloodDinner] and gain 1 [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] for every 8 [BloodDinner] this unit consumed
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain +2 [Laceration] Count
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1

text.name: Sewing
text.desc:

[WhenUse] <style="highlight">Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on target (max 2)

text.name: Scission
text.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 10% of the HP damage dealt (max 20)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 60 [BloodDinner] and gain 1 [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] for every 6 [BloodDinner] this unit consumed
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 5 [Laceration]
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] At 10+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], inflict 1 [LineCuttingPersonality] on target next turn

text.name: Scission
text.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 20% of the HP damage dealt (max 20)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 60 [BloodDinner] and gain 1 [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] for every 6 [BloodDinner] this unit consumed
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 5 [Laceration]
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] At 10+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], inflict 1 [LineCuttingPersonality] on target next turn

text.name: Scission
text.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 20% of the HP damage dealt (max 20)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 60 [BloodDinner] and gain 1 [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] for every 6 [BloodDinner] this unit consumed
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 5 [Laceration]
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1<style="highlight">

text.name: I'll Make You a New Dress!
text.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 30% of the HP damage dealt (max 20)
[BeforeAttack] At 10+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], Atk Weight +1
[WhenUse] If target has 5+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on target (max 2)
[EndSkill] Consume 15 [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] for every Atk Weight gained
[EndSkill] If target is killed, increase [BloodDinner] by 10. Regain half of [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] consumed by this Skill (once per turn)
coinDescs:
[OnSucceedAttack] At 10+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], deal +([BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] x 2)% damage (max 38%)
- At 20+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], deal +([BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] x 3)% damage instead (max 90%)

text.name: I'll Make You a New Dress!
text.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 30% of the HP damage dealt (max 20)
[BeforeAttack] At 10+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], Atk Weight +1
<style="highlight">- At 20+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], replace the above effect with Atk Weight +2 instead
[WhenUse] If target has 5+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on target (max 2)
[EndSkill] Consume <style="highlight">10 [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] for every Atk Weight gained
[EndSkill] If target is killed, increase [BloodDinner] by <style="highlight">20. Regain half of [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] consumed by this Skill (once per turn)
<style="highlight">- If target is [LineCuttingPersonality], additionally increase [BloodDinner] by 20 more, and gain 5 [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] (once per turn)
coinDescs:
[OnSucceedAttack] At 10+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], deal +([BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] x <style="highlight">3)% damage (max <style="highlight">57%)
- At 20+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], deal +([BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] x <style="highlight">4)% damage instead (max <style="highlight">120%)

1111121.name: Don Quixote Hardblood Arts 8: Scissors
1111121.desc:
1 ally with the fastest Speed: if the enemy is killed After Attack, heal 10 HP (2 times per turn)
1 ally with the fastest Speed: if the enemy is killed After Attack, inflict +1 [Laceration] Count when inflicting [Laceration] Potency with Skill or Coin effects for the next turn (3 times per turn)

1111101.name: WRONG COSTUME!!!
1111101.desc: On Hit, deal +1% damage for every 10 [BloodDinner_Accumulation] by self (max 20%)

1111102.name: Bloodfeast
1111102.desc:
If this unit is on field, or is one of the units that can appear on this Stage, increase [BloodDinner] value by the amount of [Laceration] damage collectively received by every unit. 
When this unit enters the field, the sleeping blood drenching the battlefield will rise above the surface.

1111111.name: WRONG COSTUME!!!
1111111.desc:
In a Clash against [LineCuttingPersonality], Clash Power +1.
On Hit, deal +1.5% damage for every 10 [BloodDinner_Accumulation] by self (max 30%)
On Hit, deal +0.5% damage for every [Laceration] on the target (max 10%)
